attributes.action: Ensure NHS and Front line staff have priority to Coronavirus testing kits.
attributes.additional_details: Please make sure we put our NHS workers first and ensure they are offered FIRST these vital tests.
attributes.background: I keep reading many articles regarding sports people having tests for Coronavirus when the Frontline NHS Doctors and nurses are not being offered these tests and are unsure whether they might have the virus and could be passing it onto patients.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
